Detailed Description

Holds a ProBT version triplet (major,minor,revision).

Member Function Documentation

static std::string plVersion::get_expiration_date ( )
static

Get ProBT's expiration date in yyyy-mm-dd format.

Returns "0000-00-00" if it is not a time-limited version.

static plVersion plVersion::get_version ( )
static

Return the ProBT release version.

static bool plVersion::has_expired ( )
static

Returns true if and only if this ProBT package has expired.

Once ProBT has reached its expiration date, it will raise a plExpirationError when trying to create a ProBT object.
